backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (Faculty, PDF, Annotation) and CRUD operations for a faculty PDF portal, with role-based access control, admin credential management, and query/update methods for managing faculty, PDFs, annotations, and user profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state from OldActor to NewActor by injecting default admin credentials (username: admin, password: admin1234) into the persisted state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with their IDs, titles, affected files, component dependencies, and test IDsâ€”covering admin credential login, change-credentials form, and related UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the frontend codebase structure and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including color tokens for background, foreground, primary, accent, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting up PWA metadata (manifest, apple-touch-icon, theme color) and mounting the root React component via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for EduBoard defining app name, icons, display mode (standalone), landscape orientation, and theme/background colors for installation on devices.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing a network-first strategy for navigation and ICP API calls, and a cache-first strategy for static assets, with cache versioning and cleanup on activation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, admin, faculty portal, teaching view, and developer portal, wrapped in a device registration gate and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasscodeGat: A gate component that renders a login form requiring admin username/password credentials before displaying its children, storing authentication state in sessionStorage and supporting a lock event to reset it.
frontend/src/components/AnnotationCanvas: A canvas component that handles drawing, highlighting, shapes, text, eraser, and image annotation tools on a per-page basis, rendering both saved and in-progress strokes via the Canvas 2D API.
frontend/src/components/AnnotationToolba: A toolbar component providing controls for selecting annotation tools (draw, highlight, text, eraser, shapes, image), adjusting stroke/fill color and size, navigating pages, and marking content as taught.
frontend/src/components/ChangeAdminCrede: A form component that allows updating the admin username and password, with client-side validation (min length, match check) and success/error feedback via the useSetAdminCredentials mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/CreateFacultyMod: A dialog modal for creating a new faculty member by name, with structured backend error parsing (limit reached, duplicates, auth errors) and state reset on open/close via the useAddFaculty mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/DeviceLimitBlock: A full-screen overlay component that blocks app access when the device license limit (10 devices) has been reached, displaying an informational message and contact instructions.
frontend/src/components/DeviceManagement: Displays a card UI for managing registered devices tied to a license, showing usage progress and a table of devices with the ability to remove individual entries. Uses hooks for fetching device data and enforces a 10-device limit with visual warnings.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React class-based error boundary that catches unhandled render errors and displays a full-screen fallback UI with the error message and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/FacultyManagemen: Renders a table of faculty members with inline name editing, active/inactive toggling, and deletion, using mutation hooks for each operation. Each row is a self-contained FacultyRow component managing its own edit and loading state.
frontend/src/components/FacultyPDFList.t: Fetches and displays a list of PDFs assigned to a specific faculty member as clickable cards that navigate to the teaching view. Shows loading, error, and empty states appropriately.
Renders a centered card with a dropdown for selecting a faculty member from a list, then calls an onSelect callback to proceed. Handles loading and empty-list states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the app shell with a sticky header containing navigation links to Admin, Faculty, and Dev Portal routes, plus a lock button for the admin panel and a PWA install prompt. Conditionally shows the Dev Portal link and lock button based on admin status and current route.
frontend/src/components/PDFListTable.tsx: Renders a table displaying uploaded PDFs with their title, assigned faculty names, upload date, and taught/untaught status. Shows an empty state when no PDFs exist.
frontend/src/components/PDFUploadForm.ts: Form component for uploading a PDF with a title, file selection, and faculty assignment. Reads the file as base64 and calls the uploadPDF mutation, handling subscription limit errors.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionSect: Displays subscription plan tiers (basic, premium, diamond) with usage progress bars for faculty and PDFs, billing cycle selection, and plan upgrade actions.
frontend/src/context/FacultyContext.tsx: React context that stores and exposes the currently selected faculty member's ID and name, with setter and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceRegistration: Hook that manages device registration status with a safety timeout fallback; currently bypasses backend registration and immediately sets status to 'allowed'.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, identity, and login status to React components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating faculty, PDFs, annotations, devices, and admin state via the backend actor. Also exports subscription plan tier definitions and billing cycle constants.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for a light/dark academic color palette using OKLCH values, plus utility classes for touch targets and annotation canvas.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page protected by a passcode gate, allowing admins to manage faculty, upload PDFs, view subscription info, and manage devices, with inline error handling for plan limits.
frontend/src/pages/DeveloperPortal.tsx: Developer/debug portal page displaying tabbed views of system stats, faculty with PDF counts, devices, annotations, and subscription plan details, accessible only to admins.
frontend/src/pages/FacultyPortal.tsx: Faculty portal page that shows a faculty selector when no faculty is chosen, then displays the selected faculty's assigned PDF list with options to switch faculty or navigate to the developer portal.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with a hero section, navigation buttons to Admin Panel and Faculty Portal, a feature highlights grid, and a notice displaying default admin login credentials.
frontend/src/pages/TeachingView.tsx: Full-screen teaching view page that renders a PDF (converted from base64 to blob URL) with an annotation canvas overlay, supporting freehand draw/highlight/text tools with debounced auto-save and a mark-as-taught action.
frontend/src/utils/deviceFingerprint.ts: Generates and caches a stable device fingerprint by combining browser/device characteristics (user agent, screen, canvas hash) with a persisted UUID stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Provides a React hook for PWA install prompt handling and a utility function to register the service worker for offline/installable app support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both regular and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based semantic color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 37) describing the smart board app's features, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature list for admin PDF management, faculty portal, teaching view, and device licensing.
